snippet.title: Princess Maker 4 Opening
snippet.description:
This is the Garasu Kagami opening from the Japanese PC version. This can show up when you leave it idle on the title screen for a while. (Anyone else notice Lee got a tan in later releases of PM4? xD)

Song - Garasu Kagami no Yume

Artist - Haruka Shimotsuki
